verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: approved] [ARG1: a disaster declaration for Hawaii] [ARGM-TMP: as the state deals with damage from a volcanic eruption on its largest island] .
President Trump on Friday approved a disaster declaration for Hawaii as [ARG0: the state] [V: deals] [ARG1: with damage from a volcanic eruption on its largest island] .
